timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -136,4 +140,23 @@ default Tab activeTab()
 		hidden = true
 	)
 	void setActiveTab(Tab t);
+
+	@ConfigSection(
+		name = "Advanced Farming Settings",
+		description = "These settings should not be changed unless you know what you are doing",
+		position = 7,
+		closedByDefault = true
+	)
+	String advancedSection = "advanced";
+
+	@ConfigItem(
+		keyName = FARM_TICK_OFFSET_RESET,
+		name = "Reset Automatic Farming Tick Tracking",
+		description = "Reset automatic farming tick offset tracking.",
+		section = advancedSection
+	)
+	default boolean resetFarmTickOffset()

timeline.body: `newValue` can be null. In general prefer `"value".equals(thing)` to `thing.equals(value)`

timeline.bodyHTML: newValue can be null. In general prefer "value".equals(thing) to thing.equals(value)
timeline.author: abextm

timeline.body:
Use `{}` replacement rather than string concatenation.
```suggestion
			log.debug("Farming: New region loaded. {} at {} ticks", newRegions, client.getTickCount());
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Use {} replacement rather than string concatenation.

Suggested change
log.debug("Farming: New region loaded. " + newRegions.toString() + " at " + client.getTickCount() + " ticks");
log.debug("Farming: New region loaded. {} at {} ticks", newRegions, client.getTickCount());
timeline.author: abextm

timeline.body:
```suggestion
								Integer storedOffsetPrecision = configManager.getRSProfileConfiguration(TimeTrackingConfig.CONFIG_GROUP, TimeTrackingConfig.FARM_TICK_OFFSET_PRECISION, Integer.class);
```

The config manager is capable of doing the conversion, you should use that since it handles corrupted configs.
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
String storedOffsetPrecisionString = configManager.getRSProfileConfiguration(TimeTrackingConfig.CONFIG_GROUP, TimeTrackingConfig.FARM_TICK_OFFSET_PRECISION);
Integer storedOffsetPrecision = configManager.getRSProfileConfiguration(TimeTrackingConfig.CONFIG_GROUP, TimeTrackingConfig.FARM_TICK_OFFSET_PRECISION, Integer.class);

The config manager is capable of doing the conversion, you should use that since it handles corrupted configs.
timeline.author: abextm

timeline.body: normally config keys are camel case
timeline.bodyText: normally config keys are camel case
timeline.bodyHTML: normally config keys are camel case
timeline.author: abextm

timeline.body:
```suggestion
									log.error("Farming: Offset error! Observed new offset of {}, previous observed offset was {} ({}) Player Loc:{}",
										offsetMins, storedOffsetMins, storedOffsetMins % patchTickRate, playerLocation));
```

playerLocation will never be null, and even if it could be this would be better
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
log.error("Farming: Offset error! Observed new offset of {}, previous observed offset was {} ({}) Player Loc:{}", offsetMins, storedOffsetMins, storedOffsetMins % patchTickRate, ((playerLocation != null) ? playerLocation.toString() : ""));
log.error("Farming: Offset error! Observed new offset of {}, previous observed offset was {} ({}) Player Loc:{}",
offsetMins, storedOffsetMins, storedOffsetMins % patchTickRate, playerLocation));

playerLocation will never be null, and even if it could be this would be better
timeline.author: abextm

timeline.body: should have a null check for `offsetTimeMins` too

timeline.bodyHTML: should have a null check for offsetTimeMins too
